sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_vasir_language_processor"> <x_snc_vasir_language_processor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <command>sir s -sys_id $[sir_id]</command> <display>number,short_description</display> <encoded_query>active=true^numberLIKE${sir_id}</encoded_query> <keywords/> <name>Show SIR details</name> <need_more_info>true</need_more_info> <order>500</order> <prompt display_value="Which one do you mean?">85d0669adbc54c90fd548ebe159619ad</prompt> <regex>^show sir (.+)</regex> <regex_group>1</regex_group> <sys_created_by>martin.meduna</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-11-14 11:40:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e075b66edb41cc90fd548ebe1596199f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>martin.meduna</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-11-14 13:36:24</sys_updated_on> <table_name>sn_si_incident</table_name> <variable_name>sir_id</variable_name> </x_snc_vasir_language_processor> </record_update>
